data.text:
Kevin Bannon, 64, of Indianapolis passed away on October 15, 2020. He will be missed deeply by his family, friends, and all the lives he has touched.

Kevin is survived by his loving wife of 46 years, Cathy Bannon; his daughters, Crystal Felts and Jennifer Bannon; his siblings, Robert C Bannon Sr. and Albert Michael Bannon (Tricia); and his beloved grandchildren, Kailyn and Delaney.

Kevin is preceded in death by his parents, Albert Craig Bannon and Phyllis Jean (Behrman) Bannon; and his grandchild, Aven.

A visitation will be held Friday, October 23, 2020 from 11AM-1PM with a service beginning at 1PM at Flanner Buchananâ€”Washington Park East, 10722 East Washington Street.
